definition: an acute viral disease of the nervous system of warm-blooded animals (usually transmitted by the bite of a rabid animal)
details:
noun
- an acute viral disease of the nervous system of warm-blooded animals (usually transmitted by the bite of a rabid animal)

= synonyms: madness
